statistics: The whole website can be found on Github, and is open source
Hosting is taken care of by Github pages, with a custom CNAME
The link images were generated using Icomoon, a lovely tool for fonts
These stats are automatically generated at build time, using grunt for CI
The font used on this site is Cabin, one of the Google fonts
This site doesn't use any javascript libraries, and is just plain JS (though there are some node libraries for the grunt build)
